snippet: Tomas Berdych pulled out of the U.S. Open on Saturday, saying he's been diagnosed with appendicitis and needs time to recover....
lead_paragraph: Tomas Berdych pulled out of the U.S. Open on Saturday, saying he's been diagnosed with appendicitis and needs time to recover.

headline.print_headline: Tomas Berdych Drops Out of US Open Because of Appendicitis
headline.main: Tomas Berdych Drops Out of US Open Because of Appendicitis
